aka: The Moon is the Father of Mine

cast.name: 朱维·丘瓜什维利 Givi Chuguashvili

writer.name: 乔治·奥瓦什威利 George Ovashvili
鲁洛夫·扬·米尼勃 Roelof Jan Minneboo

director.name: 乔治·奥瓦什威利 George Ovashvili

this_title: The Moon Is a Father of Mine
trans_title: The Moon is the Father of Mine
introduction: Georgia, 1991. Twelve-year-old city boy Toma lives with his grandmother in Tbilisi. He refuses to shy away from the bullies at school that taunt him out for his affection for Anana. One day, Toma and his grandmother are visited by Nemo, Toma’s father, who comes back from prison. Toma has no memory of him: Nemo left when Toma was only two. Nemo takes Toma to his parental village in the mountains from where they set out on a hunting trip. Through ups and downs, Toma slowly starts to feel a connection to his father.
chinese_title: The Moon Is a Father of Mine
